definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to gather together/to collect/to approach/to draw near to/to add/to sum up/to comb (hair)

sentences.english: We had gathered magnolia seed pods for hand grenades;
sentences.chinese: 我們把木蘭花籽的莢果集攏起來，當手榴彈用。

sentences.english: The cattle were rounded up, and those to be sent away were kept together.
sentences.chinese: 先把牛羣集攏，然後把要趕到城鎮去的牛關在一起。

sentences.english: The cattle were rounded up, and those to be sent away were kept together. (L10)
sentences.chinese: 先把牛羣集攏，然後把要趕到城鎮去的牛關在一起。

sentences.english: SULLEN N clouds are gathering fast over the black fringe of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲很快地集攏在森林的黝黑的邊緣上。

sentences.english: SULLEN clouds are gathering fast over the black fringe of the forest.
sentences.chinese: 烏雲很快地集攏在森林的黝黑的邊緣上。
